author: Meagan Flynn
title: An Illinois mayor ordered police to enforce the stay-at-home order. They did — and busted his wife at a bar. - The Washington Post
description: An Illinois mayor ordered police to enforce the stay-at-home order. They did — and busted his wife at a bar. The Washington Post A mayor ordered police to crack down on social gatherings. They found his wife at a bar CNN An Illinois mayor had cops crack down …
content:
So on Friday, Alton Mayor Brant Walker ordered the police department to start issuing citations to anyone refusing to comply with Pritzkers order, telling residents he was begging them to stay home.
The police duly complied. Then, around 1 a.m. Sunday, the m… [+2542 chars]
